overview.tax_residency_rules: Based on physical presence for 183 days or more per year.
overview.tax_filing_frequency: Annually, by March 31 following the end of the tax year.

capital_gains_tax.rate: Capital gains are taxed at the same rate as personal income.

double_taxation_agreements.description: Avoids double taxation on income and capital gains.
Avoids double taxation on income and capital gains.

crypto_tax.income_tax_rate: Income from cryptocurrencies is taxed at the individual's personal income tax rate.
crypto_tax.capital_gains_rate: Capital gains from cryptocurrencies are taxed at the same rate as capital gains from other assets.
crypto_tax.mining_tax: Mining of cryptocurrencies is considered a business activity and is taxed accordingly.

nft_tax.income_tax_rate: Income from NFTs is taxed at the individual's personal income tax rate.
nft_tax.capital_gains_rate: Capital gains from NFTs are taxed at the same rate as capital gains from other assets.

additional_notes.political_risks: Stable political environment with a low level of corruption.
additional_notes.economic_stability: Moderate economic growth and a stable currency.
additional_notes.legal_system: Well-developed legal system based on Roman-Dutch law.
additional_notes.ease_of_doing_business: Ranked 85th in the World Bank's Ease of Doing Business Index.
